name: Zombie Survival Outbreak
description:
ESIU, or Early Silence Investigation Unit, is a secret unit that gathers intelligence on the research, produce, and trade of illagal weapons in certain areas. You are one of the members of Initial Analysis Division of ESIU.

Your division is in charge of investigating how many ESIU members are required to carry out this operation. These investigations are usually done by alone.

One day, An unbelievable report has came in...

--------------------

V 1.00

Release.
